text: Dimitar Iliev Popov () (26 June 1927 in Kula - 5 December 2015) was a leading Bulgarian judge and politician. He was the first Prime Minister of the country not to be a member of the Bulgarian Communist Party since 1946.Judge elected Premier of Bulgaria ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Judges Category:Prime Ministers of Bulgaria
title: Dimitar Iliev Popov
